abstract: Dale Carnegie and Emily Post  get updated for the digital age, iPhone gets an upgrade, eye doctors grow wary of Avastin and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
snippet: Dale Carnegie and Emily Post  get updated for the digital age, iPhone gets an upgrade, eye doctors grow wary of Avastin and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Wednesday Reading: Dale Carnegie and Emily Post for the Digital Age
